alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 26 at 3:48AM PDT until March 27 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures 32 to 36 degrees will result in very cold mornings and may cause frost formation. Localized spots may reach 30 degrees. * WHERE...Sonoma Coastal Range, North Bay Interior Mountains and North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT Monday. The hours of most concern will be 4 am to 9 am each morning. * IMPACTS...Residents in homes without power as well as the unsheltered or marginally sheltered populations will be at risk in these cold early morning temperatures. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect people, pets, and plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range
